origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FintechResearchAPI.get_latest_tech', 'description': 'This function provides the latest fintech technologies used in a specific sector for a given year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector where fintech is applied, e.g., banking, insurance.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the latest fintech technologies are requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'technologies', 'description': 'A list of the latest fintech technologies used in the specified sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FintechResearchAPI.get_latest_tech, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'banking', 'year'是'2023'.
